GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.14 to before v4.9.337
GSD.description:
hfs: Fix OOB Write in hfs_asc2mac

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.337 by commit 8399318b13dc9e0569dee07ba2994098926d4fb2, it was introduced in version v2.6.14 by commit 328b9227865026268261a24a97a578907b280415. For more details please see the references link.
